name: Shipyard Infiltration
description:
Stop a drug cartel from making their shipments on time. Infiltrate their ship and blow it up. We don't want them to catch you, this is a stealth infiltration mission. Use your newly designed thermal sensing equipment and stay light on your feet. We're counting on you.

Credits:

  • Made by Justin Minus/Game Designer
  • Instuctor: Mark Girourd
  • Made in GAM 270: Level Design for Video Games 2

Platform/System:

  • Built in Unreal Engine
  • For Windows PC
